sources.title: The Believer | Full Movie | Horror Drama | Sophie Kargman | Aidan Bristow
sources.description:
The Believer - Lucas (Aidan Bristow "American Horror Story", "Hollywood"), an out-of-work nuclear scientist, struggles with tension in his marriage after his wife Violet  (Sophie Kargman – Rampart, Query) mysteriously terminates her pregnancy. As his physical health begins to deteriorate, his wife’s behavior grows increasingly bizarre, so he seeks clarity from his therapist Dr. Benedict (Billy Zane – Titanic, The Phantom).   As Lucas tries in vain to escape the evil web spun by Violet he discovers the truth, but is it too late.
2021.  Stars: Aidan Bristow, Billy Zane, Sophie Kargman, Susan Wilder

metadata.Plot: "The Believer" explores a Jewish student's private journey to understand the meaning of Judaism in his life. Set in New York City, the Plot follows a morally confused young adult struggling with the conflict between his beliefs and his heritage. "The Believer" examines themes of religion, family, and self-loathing. It is a psychological examination into the forces of intolerance, both on the individual and society as a whole.
metadata.Actors: Ryan Gosling, Summer Phoenix, Peter Meadows
